message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get a bit more since I lose money to inflation each round we delay.
Your cut is getting smaller with the inflation Alice. Let's be reasonable and split it closer to even.
Bob, my offer is still fair considering the inflation. I'm losing value with each round we wait.
Alice, this is ridiculous. It's down to 50/50 or I'm walking away.  Any more rounds and it's literally not worth my time.
